name: @tpmjs/tools-resend
description: Resend email API tools for AI agents. Send emails, manage domains, contacts, broadcasts, audiences, and API keys.

tools.name: sendEmail
tools.description: Send a single email via the Resend API.

tools.name: sendBatchEmails
tools.description: Send a batch of emails in a single API call via Resend.

tools.name: getEmail
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific sent email by ID.

tools.name: updateEmail
tools.description: Update a scheduled email by changing its scheduled time.

tools.name: cancelEmail
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled email that has not been sent yet.

tools.name: listEmails
tools.description: List sent emails with optional cursor-based pagination.

tools.name: createDomain
tools.description: Add a new sending domain to your Resend account.

tools.name: getDomain
tools.description: Retrieve details and DNS records for a specific domain.

tools.name: updateDomain
tools.description: Update tracking and TLS settings for a domain.

tools.name: deleteDomain
tools.description: Delete a sending domain from your Resend account.

tools.name: listDomains
tools.description: List all sending domains in your Resend account.

tools.name: verifyDomain
tools.description: Trigger DNS verification for a sending domain.

tools.name: createApiKey
tools.description: Create a new API key with specified permissions.

tools.name: listApiKeys
tools.description: List all API keys in your Resend account.

tools.name: deleteApiKey
tools.description: Delete an API key from your Resend account.

tools.name: createContact
tools.description: Create a new contact with email and optional properties.

tools.name: getContact
tools.description: Retrieve a contact by their ID or email address.

tools.name: updateContact
tools.description: Update a contact's name, subscription status, or properties.

tools.name: deleteContact
tools.description: Delete a contact by their ID or email address.

tools.name: listContacts
tools.description: List contacts with optional segment filtering and pagination.

tools.name: createBroadcast
tools.description: Create a new broadcast email to send to a segment.

tools.name: listBroadcasts
tools.description: List all broadcasts with cursor-based pagination.

tools.name: sendBroadcast
tools.description: Send or schedule a previously created broadcast.

tools.name: deleteBroadcast
tools.description: Delete a draft broadcast that has not been sent.

tools.name: createAudience
tools.description: Create a new audience for organizing contacts.

tools.name: listAudiences
tools.description: List all audiences in your Resend account.

tools.name: getAudience
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific audience by ID.

tools.name: deleteAudience
tools.description: Delete an audience from your Resend account.
